title: Robotics and Programming with LEGO Mindstorms
description: Build and program your own EV3 robot! This course allows students to build and program the EV3 robots, implementing sensors and motors.

title: Minecraft Programming with MakeCode
description: Learn through block programming and make changes on your favorite game.

title: Minecraft World Building and Instruction Programming
description: Through the creation of the learning world, Minecraft command-line command control, and MakeCode graphical programming platform, gradually bring your child into the programming world.

title: Minecraft World Development and Instructional Programming
description: Through the creation of the learning world, Minecraft command line command control, and the MakeCode graphical programming platform, children are gradually brought into the programming world step by step.

title: Innovative Programming with MIT Scratch
description: Learn to create games and animations with Scratch. Scratch helps young people think creatively, logically, and work collaboratively, which are essential skills in the 21st century.

title: MIT Scratch Programming 2
description: Learn advanced Scratch programming, unleash your creativity, and share your work with young programmers from all over the world

title: Robotics and Programming with SPRK
description: Learn how to program and control a robot, and enter the world of coding.

title: Microbit: Intro to Electronics Engineering
description: Relying on the Microsoft platform, JavaScript command line command control, and MakeCode Block Coding platform, gradually bring children into the world of electronic programming.

title: Javascript Programming with Minecraft MakeCode
description: Through the creation of the learning world and the MakeCode graphical programming platform, gradually bring children into the learning stage of writing Javascript codes.

title: Game Development with Roblox Studio
description: Learn programming fundamentals and create your own games with Roblox Studio!

title: Advanced Roblox Game Development and Lua Programming
description: Learn programming fundamentals and create your own games with Roblox Studio!

title: Roblox: Preliminary Artificial Intelligence and Lua Practice
description: Develop intelligent game AI on the Roblox platform, and start the first step in AI programming learning

title: Advanced Python Programming: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Learn the most popular programming language in the industry

title: Mobile App Programming with MIT App Inventor
description: Learn how to program and develop mobile apps. Become the next young entrepreneurs
